bug.author: arraydude
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
st_in_cache_warning.py is not working as expected . The three different cached functions that should do a st.write() are not doing anything. <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
run streamlit run e2e/scripts/st_in_cache_warning.py see
<denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
We should see two different paragraphs and one button. <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
I'm only seeing the message: <denchmark-code> If this is failing locally, it could be because you have a browser with Streamlit open. Close it and the test should pass. </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>Is this a regression?</denchmark-h>
That is, did this use to work the way you expected in the past? yes <denchmark-h:h1>Additional information</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://4870-204086862-gh.circle-artifacts.com/0/frontend/cypress/videos/st_in_cache_warning.spec.ts.mp4>https://4870-204086862-gh.circle-artifacts.com/0/frontend/cypress/videos/st_in_cache_warning.spec.ts.mp4</denchmark-link>
